Class RequirementEntityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.requirementmodels.RequirementEntityManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class RequirementEntityManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.EntityManager<Requirement>
    This is the entity manager for the Requirement in the RequirementManager module.

    tianchanggu

        public RequirementEntityManager(edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.database.Data db)
        Constructs the entity manager. This constructor is called by edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.ManagerLayer#ManagerLayer(). To make sure this happens, be sure to place add this entity manager to the map in the ManagerLayer file.
        Parameters:
        db - a reference to the persistent database
